citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:54a on
29-AUG-18.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility and spoke with the licensee by text message. The licensee was not available to
return for an inspection.
